publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation.

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation.
S1M-571 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 21 February 2000) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-571 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 21 February 2000) Fiona McLeod*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Elaine Smith*

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Elaine Smith

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Elaine Smith
S1M-571 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 21 February 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Elaine Smith, Mr Michael McMahon
S1M-571 Airdrieonians Football Club (lodged on 21 February 2000) Cathie Craigie*

S1M-571 Karen Whitefield: Airdrieonians Football Club—That the Parliament recognises the important role played by local football teams in engendering and enhancing community spirit and offers its support to the fans of Airdrieonians Football Club, which is currently under the threat of liquidation. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Fiona McLeod, Donald Gorrie, Elaine Smith, Mr Michael McMahon, Cathie Craigie
